lyrics:
Verse 1:
Coffee shops and rainy afternoons
Vinyl records playing old-time tunes
Your smile fades like polaroid memories
Lost in thoughts of what we used to be

Chorus:
We were young and wild and free
Dreaming under autumn trees
Now the seasons changed their face
And I can't find our special place

Verse 2:
City lights don't shine the way they did
When we were just a couple of kids
Time moves on but I'm still standing here
Holding onto moments that disappeared
